name: Endless Office
description:
In-game text are mainly writen in tradition chinese.

Non-chinese may have difficulties to solve the riddles.

How to play : 

WASD to Move

Space to Jump

Left Control to squat

Click on objects to interact

Made by re.start.101 with free asset found in unity store.

1. Slender man by #NVJOB Nicholas Veselov

2. Effect textures and prefabs by Magicpot Inc.

3. Office Supplies Low Poly by Sten Ulfsson

4. Paintings Free by Webcadabra

5. Low Poly Park by Polygon-Park

6. Low Poly Office Pack: Characters & Props by PolygonalMind

7. SimpleHands by sametsylmz3d

8. Stylized Vehicles Pack Free by Alex Lenk

9. PathCreator by SebLague
